id: These photos of Kristen Chenoweth standing next to the gigantic Boban Marjanović are greatThese photos of Kristen Chenoweth standing next to the gigantic Boban Marjanović are greatThese photos of Kristen Chenoweth standing next to the gigantic Boban Marjanović are great
paragraph:

	By Andy Nesbitt
October 30, 2018 7:30 pm

		By: Andy Nesbitt		| October 30, 2018 7:30 pm		

Singer/actor Kristen Chenoweth was in Oklahoma City on Tuesday night to sing the national anthem before the Clippers-Thunder game.Before that happened, however, she ran into Clippers center Boban Marjanović, who stands 7-foot-3… but looks a lot bigger than that.Chenoweth, a Tony Award winner, is 4-foot-11. Which makes this photo absolutely incredible:(Photo by Andrew D. Bernstein/NBAE via Getty Images)And then look at how small her hand looks in this one.(Photo by Andrew D. Bernstein/NBAE via Getty Images)Those are just too good.Los Angeles Clippers, NBA, NBA
